synopses.synopsis: Iceland's Bardarbunga volcano alert raised to orange

The risk of an eruption at Iceland's Bardarbunga volcano has increased, after a series of earthquakes in the region.
The risk level to the aviation industry has been raised to orange, the second-highest level.
The eruption of Iceland's Eyjafjallajokull volcano in 2010 shut down much of Europe's airspace for six days, affecting more than 10 million people.
Sophie Hutchinson reports.
